txt.en: You arrive in Direnfirel, and it is clear that you are not alone
You have found the tracks of Stangraf and you hear sounds that indicate you are not alone....
You find the gate is locked, but the key must be somewhere in the area
Careful to not alert too many of the squatters to your presence, you press forward into the mine.
'A key is required to unlock this gate.'
You acquired the key to the locked gate and can now confront those who reside within the enclosure
You have made it deep into the mine, and the end must be near as the leader of these squatters can be seen below.
You step forward into the ruins of Gemyndsted, ready to face the intruders you see ahead
You step forward into the ruins of Gemyndsted, ready to face the intruders you see ahead
You find your way into the lower tunnels and prepare yourself for the upcoming battle within
You turn the corner and see the final chambers of Gemyndsted. Ahead, you hear the sounds of shuffling and rubble crumbling
